name: Vanished the odd trail
description:
Vanished - The odd trail was a uni project that we had to make it on our 2nd year together with the design students. It was composed by two programmers and five artist. 

The game is just a prototype, it's not the final product, so you may encounter some bugs. :)

The game has 3 type of enemies and the final boss, I won't tell you, i'll let you find them out :D and think of what you can do with arrows ;) 

Pay special attention to the notes that you will find around the forest, it contains important clues on how to defeat the boss.

Meet the team:

David Costa - Gameplay programmer

Telmo Francisco - Gameplay programmer

Aurora da Silva - Artist

Bernardo Cruz Gomes - Artist

Catarina Cruz - Artist

Ema Parreira - Artist

Jessica Sutton - Artist

Not sure where this project is going but right now we don't plan to make any new update.
